ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared
Interface MeasurementListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.rmi.Remote
public interface MeasurementListener
extends java.util.EventListener, java.rmi.Remote

A listener which gets notified about the progress of a measurement.

Author:
Moritz Lang

Method Summary
 void errorOccured(MicroscopeException e)
          Function gets invoked if error occurs during the measurement.
 void measurementFinished()
          Function gets invoked when the measurement has stoped execution.
 void measurementQueued()
          Function gets invoked when the measurement is queued and will be activated as soon as the microscope is free.
 void measurementStarted()
          Function gets invoked when the measurement starts execution.
 void measurementUnqueued()
          Function is invoked when measurement is removed from the queue without being stated
